message:
Shanti ashbe bole -

Ekdin ek bikel belar majhe
Chutto ek kishuri othoba kishor
Shara din pitake khuje,

Bikel perie holo ze rat
Kete gelo oshonkho
Bhor
Protikkha ar munajat,

Ekdin shei molin mukhe
Du cukh khushite cholo cholo
Uthlo hashir ban,

Bisshasher shokti buke
Danober dol dhonsho
Holo
Shantir fuara onirban !
- Azad Mohammad
